output: html_document

What is the effect of using WS process blanks for correcting water secondaries? 

1. Extract DIC data by wheel.
2. Find WS blanks by wheel and average
3. Apply LBC using WS blanks
4. Compare with DIC corrected with HY blanks

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

## R Markdown

```{r}
library(amstools)
library(tidyverse)
library(here)
library(knitr)
library(odbc)

options(digits = 5)
theme_set(theme_light())

std <- read_csv(here("data/std.csv"))

wstd <- std %>%
        filter(process == "WS")

std %>% 
        filter(rec_num %in% c(83028, 159579)) %>%
        group_by(wheel) %>%
        summarize(BlankFm = mean(f_modern))

unique(wstd$name)

names(wstd)

con <- conNOSAMS()
dbListFields(con, "snics_results")

```
